title: Programming Practical Competency Enhancement: Child-Focused Educational Website Evaluation Design Based on a Developmental Perspective

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of educational technology and understanding of web-based learning tools
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three evaluation criteria for child-appropriate educational websites based on developmental stages
Learners can write evaluation reports analyzing actual website cases in terms of navigation usability, technical design, accessibility, and instructional design
Learners can improve evaluation tools by applying principles of semi-structured interview design for learner feedback collection
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
